Minecraft凌云帝国服务器（MinecraftLingYunCraft）
  注意：为了方便玩家阅读，本服务器介绍采用中文+英文模式，中文用户可直接进行阅读，英文用户需展开文字框进行阅读
Note: in order to facilitate the player to read, this server is introduced using the mode in Chinese + English, Chinese users can directly read, English user needs to read a text box

服务器简介:
    Minecraft凌云帝国服务器是一个1.8.X的中小型RPG服务器，我们服务器采用生存+RPG的游戏模式，您既可以像网游一样疯狂的刷副本，也可以做一个普普通通的农夫，在本服务器内，我们做如下规定：
1.本服务器的通用货币有三种，分别是[clay_ingot](铜),[iron_ingot](铁),[gold_ingot](金)。他们的汇率为1:10:100
2.本服务器开启死亡不掉落，所以因“死亡掉落”导致的物品/货币损失我们概不负责
3.禁止在服务器辱骂他人，宣传其他服务器,一经发现，我们将进行封号处理
4.禁止破环主城周围200格以内的所有方块，一经发现，我们将进行清空背包处理

Minecraft server lingyun empire is a 1.8.X of the small and medium-sized RPG server, our server using survival + RPG game mode, you can either crazy copy of the brush like online game, can also do an ordinary farmer, in this server, we make the following provisions:
1. There are three kinds of common currency, this server is (copper), respectively (iron), (gold). Their exchange rates to 1:10:100
2. The server open sticktite death, so as a result of "dead" items/we shall not be liable for any monetary loss
3. The ban on the server abuse, publicity and other server, once found, we will have titles processing
